# Web Next.js Documentation References

This directory contains curated documentation references for the web-nextjs stack.

## Official Documentation

All agents and skills in this stack have **permission to research before asking**. When implementing features, consult these authoritative sources:

### Core Framework
| Technology | Documentation URL | Version |
|------------|-------------------|---------|
| Next.js | https://nextjs.org/docs | 16.x |
| React | https://react.dev | 19.x |
| TypeScript | https://www.typescriptlang.org/docs | 5.7.x |

### Styling
| Technology | Documentation URL | Version |
|------------|-------------------|---------|
| Tailwind CSS | https://tailwindcss.com/docs | 3.x |
| CSS Modules | https://nextjs.org/docs/app/building-your-application/styling/css-modules | - |

### Database & ORM
| Technology | Documentation URL | Version |
|------------|-------------------|---------|
| Drizzle | https://www.db.io/docs | 6.x |
| PostgreSQL | https://www.postgresql.org/docs/current/ | 16.x |

### Authentication
| Technology | Documentation URL | Version |
|------------|-------------------|---------|
| Auth.js (NextAuth) | https://authjs.dev | 5.x |

### Payments
| Technology | Documentation URL | Version |
|------------|-------------------|---------|
| Stripe | https://stripe.com/docs | 2024+ |
| Stripe.js | https://stripe.com/docs/stripe-js | latest |

### AI Integration
| Technology | Documentation URL | Version |
|------------|-------------------|---------|
| Vercel AI SDK | https://sdk.vercel.ai | 3.x |
| Anthropic API | https://docs.anthropic.com | 2024+ |
| Vertex AI | https://cloud.google.com/vertex-ai/docs | latest |

### Testing
| Technology | Documentation URL | Version |
|------------|-------------------|---------|
| Jest | https://jestjs.io/docs/getting-started | 29.x |
| React Testing Library | https://testing-library.com/docs/react-testing-library/intro | 14.x |
| Playwright | https://playwright.dev/docs/intro | 1.x |

### Forms & Validation
| Technology | Documentation URL | Version |
|------------|-------------------|---------|
| React Hook Form | https://react-hook-form.com | 7.x |
| Zod | https://zod.dev | 3.x |

## Research Protocol

When implementing any feature:

1. **Check official docs first** - Use the URLs above
2. **Verify version compatibility** - Ensure patterns match our versions
3. **Look for migration guides** - When upgrading or using new features
4. **Check changelogs** - For breaking changes in recent versions

## Key Documentation Sections

### Next.js 16
- App Router: https://nextjs.org/docs/app
- Server Components: https://nextjs.org/docs/app/building-your-application/rendering/server-components
- Server Actions: https://nextjs.org/docs/app/building-your-application/data-fetching/server-actions-and-mutations
- Caching: https://nextjs.org/docs/app/building-your-application/caching

### React 19
- Server Components: https://react.dev/reference/rsc/server-components
- use() hook: https://react.dev/reference/react/use
- useActionState: https://react.dev/reference/react/useActionState
- useOptimistic: https://react.dev/reference/react/useOptimistic

### Tailwind CSS 3
- Configuration: https://tailwindcss.com/docs/configuration
- Dark Mode: https://tailwindcss.com/docs/dark-mode
- Container Queries: https://tailwindcss.com/docs/container-queries
